name: Paprika Pork Stir-Fry
description: A quick and flavorful stir-fry with pork, paprika, and onions.
steps: 1. Cut the pork into thin strips and slice the onion.
2. Heat a pan over medium heat, add some oil, and sauté the onions until translucent.
3. Add the pork strips to the pan and cook until browned.
4. Sprinkle paprika and pepper over the cooked pork, stir well, and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.

name: Beef and Pepper Skewers
description: Delicious skewers made with juicy beef, peppers, and onions.
steps: 1. Cut the beef into cubes and chop the onion and pepper into large pieces.
2. Thread beef, onion, and pepper onto skewers, alternating between ingredients.
3. Season with salt, pepper, and a sprinkle of paprika for added flavor.
4. Grill on medium heat for about 10-15 minutes, turning occasionally until the beef is cooked to your liking.
5. Serve hot alongside a salad or rice.
